add_mlir_conversion_library(MLIRMathToLLVM
  MathToLLVM.cpp

  ADDITIONAL_HEADER_DIRS
  ${MLIR_MAIN_INCLUDE_DIR}/mlir/Conversion/MathToLLVM

  DEPENDS
  MLIRConversionPassIncGen

  LINK_COMPONENTS
  Core

  LINK_LIBS PUBLIC
  MLIRLLVMCommonConversion
  MLIRLLVMIR
  MLIRMath
  MLIRPass
  MLIRTransforms
  )
